汮字的基本解释

汮
jūn
古河名，上、中游即今河南省西部的老灌河和淅川，下游即汇合淅川后的丹江。

汮字的汉语字典释义

[①]［jūn］
［《廣韻》居匀切，平諄，見。］
均水的古名，汉水支流之一。上、中游即今河南省西部的老灌河、淅川，下游即汇合淅川以后的丹江。

汮字的康熙字典解释

【巳集上】【水字部】　汮； 康熙笔画：8； 页码：页607第16
【廣韻】居銀切，音巾。水名。出沂縣。【水經】汮水出沂縣北山，南流過其縣之東，又南入於沔。【酈道元注】順陽縣有石山，南臨汮水。汮水又南流，注於沔水，謂之汮口。地理志謂之涓水，言熊耳之山，涓水出焉，至順陽入沔。　又【集韻】規倫切，音均。又龍春切，音倫。又兪倫切，音勻。又怡成切，音盈。又九峻切，音呁。義?同。

汮字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体韩国明朝体
汮字的起名意思

均水的古名，汉水支流之一。

Pan
Basic explanation of words
Pan
jūn
The name of the ancient river, the upper and middle reaches are the Laoguanhe and Xichuan in the western part of Henan Province, and the lower reaches are the Danjiang which merges with Xichuan.
Pan
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［jūn］
["Guangyun" Juyun cut, smooth, see you. ]
The ancient name of Junshui, one of the tributaries of Hanshui. The upper and middle reaches are the Laoguanhe and Xichuan in the western part of Henan Province, and the lower reaches are the Danjiang after the confluence of Xichuan.
Pan
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Siji 1] [Water Word Department] 　汮; Kangxi strokes: 8; Page number: page 607-16
[Guang Yun] Ju silver cut, sound towel. Water name. Out of Yi County. [Water Classic] Panshui flows out of Beishan, Yixian County, flows through the east of the county in the south, and enters Yumian in the south. [Li Daoyuan's Note] There are stone mountains in Shunyang County, and Panshui in the south. Panshui flows south again, and it is poured into Mianshui, which is called Pankou. Geography is called the trickling water, the mountain of bear ears, trickling water out of Yan, and entering Shunyang.　[Jiyun] Rules and Lunqie, uniform sound. Long Chun cut again, Yinlun. He Lun cut again, the sound is uniform. Yicheng cut again, Yin Ying. Nine Jun cuts again, the sound is humming. Righteous? Same.
Pan
